choose_language:
🌟 Welcome to Your Numerology Journey 🌟
✨ Unlock the secrets of your numbers and discover your hidden path. ✨

🌟 Добро пожаловать в ваше путешествие по нумерологии 🌟
✨ Откройте тайные послания чисел и найдите свой путь. ✨

━━━━━━━━━━━━

🌐 *Please choose your language*
⬇️ Tap your preferred language below to begin your personal reading. ⬇️

🌐 *Пожалуйста, выберите язык*
⬇️ Нажмите на язык ниже, чтобы начать личное чтение. ⬇️
language_prompt:
🌐 *Change Language*

Select the language that feels most natural for receiving your personal numerology insights.

━━━━━━━━━━━━

🇬🇧 *English*   
🇷🇺 *Русский* 

⬇️ Tap a language to begin your journey.
about_text:
💫 *About Futuredigits*

Futuredigits is more than a numerology app—it’s your guide into the symbolic language of numbers. Each digit in your *name* and *birth date* carries meaning, and together they compose the unique rhythm of your life’s path. We combine ancient wisdom with refined, insightful analysis, so every reading speaks directly to your soul.

**What you’ll receive**
• **Clarity** — accurate calculations paired with practical suggestions you can act on today.  
• **Depth** — interpretations that reveal not only the facts, but the emotional and spiritual context behind them.  
• **Harmony** — guidance that helps you live in alignment with your natural cycles and inner truth.

**How it works**
We explore your key numbers—*Life Path, Soul Urge, Personality, Expression, Destiny* and more—presenting them in a calm, supportive, and meaningful way. Whether you’re reflecting on love, career, creativity, or personal growth, your numbers become a compass that points toward clarity.

**Why it matters**
Futuredigits delivers insights that resonate deeply. We honor your story and speak to it with care, empathy, and precision. Your path is one-of-a-kind—your guidance should be as well.

✨ _Trust the numbers. Feel their energy. Let them illuminate your way._
start_message:
👋 *Welcome to Futuredigits!*

We transform your birth date and name into deep numerological insights — calculated instantly.

Discover your *Life Path*, *Soul Urge*, *Personality*, *Destiny* and more. Each tool gives you personalized meaning and clarity. 🌟

Tap below to begin your numerology journey 🔮
help_text:
🛠 *How to Use Futuredigits*

Choose any numerology tool from the menu. You’ll be asked for your birth date or name.

Each result is generated instantly with deep, professional insight. Want more? Unlock *Premium Tools* for expanded guidance. 💎
premium_intro:
💎 *Welcome to Futuredigits Premium*

Unlock advanced tools and deeper guidance:
• Passion Number • Compatibility • Love Vibes • Karmic Debt • Personal Year • Name Vibration, and more.

✨ *Benefits:*
Deeper forecasts, timing windows, emotional insights, karmic patterns.

🔓 *Pricing:*
$7/week • $17/month • $79 lifetime (best value)

👉 [Tap here to upgrade](https://your-payment-link.com)
premium_menu_intro:
💎 *Premium Tools Menu*

These readings reveal hidden patterns of love, destiny, and purpose. You also get *one Premium tool for free* as a trial.

Choose a tool below to begin. ✨
back_to_main_text:
🏠 *Back to Main Menu*

Choose a numerology tool below to get started:
premium_locked:
🔒 *This is a Premium tool.*

You’ve already used your 1 free Premium trial.

To unlock all tools:
💎 *$7/week* • *$17/month* • *$79 lifetime*

👉 [Upgrade here](https://your-payment-link.com) or tap *💎 Upgrade Now*.
premium_trial_granted:
🎁 *You’ve unlocked a Premium tool for free!*
Enjoy your reading — the next one will require an upgrade. 💎
error_invalid_name: ❗ *Invalid name.* Please enter your full name using letters only.
error_two_names:
❗ *Please enter two full names separated by a comma.*
Example: `Emma Grace, John Carter`
intro_life_path:
🔢 *Life Path Number*

Your Life Path Number is one of the most important numbers in numerology. It reveals your natural strengths, personality blueprint, and the path you are meant to walk in life. 🌟

It's calculated by reducing your full birthdate to a single digit or master number (11, 22, 33).

Please enter your birthdate in the format: `DD.MM.YYYY` 📅
intro_soul_urge:
💖 *Soul Urge Number*

This number reveals the secret longings of your heart — your inner motivations, passions, and emotional drive. It uncovers what your soul truly craves beneath the surface. 🌟

Please enter your full name to discover your Soul Urge Number. ✍️
intro_personality:
🎭 *Personality Number*

This number reflects how others see you — the first impression your energy gives. It reveals your outer traits, social style, and the mask you wear to the world. 🌟

Please enter your full name to discover your Personality Number. ✍️
intro_birthday:
🎂 *Birthday Number*

This number comes from the day you were born and reveals a natural gift or strength you're born with. It’s a hidden gem of your character. 🌟

Please enter your birthdate in the format: `DD.MM.YYYY` 📅
intro_expression:
🎯 *Expression Number*

Also known as the Destiny Number, this reveals your natural talents, capabilities, and what you're here to express in the world. ✨

Please enter your full name to calculate your Expression Number. ✍️
intro_destiny:
🌟 *Destiny Number*

Your Destiny Number reveals the greater path your soul is meant to walk — combining the vibration of your name and birthdate. It reflects your higher calling, life mastery, and the impact you're here to make. 🔮

Please enter your full name followed by your birthdate on one line:
`Name DD.MM.YYYY`
intro_passion:
🧩 *Passion Number – The Hidden Fire Within*

Your *Passion Number* reveals the soul-level longings that quietly guide your heart. It is the secret flame that fuels your deepest emotions, shaping your desires, attractions, and the inner drive you can’t explain. ✨

This number uncovers what excites your spirit beyond logic – the people, experiences, and callings that ignite your creativity and bring you true joy. It is the energy you return to lifetime after lifetime, the vibration that fulfills you on a soul-deep level.

When you understand your Passion Number, you uncover the emotional blueprint that inspires you most, helping you live with more alignment and purpose. 💫

✍️ *Please enter your full name to reveal your Passion Number.*
intro_karmic_debt:
🕳 *Karmic Debt – Lessons from Past Lifetimes*

In numerology, certain numbers reveal unfinished lessons carried over from previous lifetimes. These *Karmic Debt Numbers* indicate challenges your soul agreed to experience to grow and evolve spiritually. 🔮

Karmic Debts often appear as repeating patterns in relationships, finances, or personal struggles that feel heavier than mere coincidence. They hold the key to deep transformation—once you face and integrate them, they become sources of wisdom and strength.

Understanding your karmic numbers reveals why certain situations repeat, and how you can finally release old energetic ties and move forward lighter and freer. ✨

📅 *Please enter your birthdate in the format: `DD.MM.YYYY` to uncover your karmic lessons.*
intro_compatibility:
💑 *Compatibility Reading – Two Souls in Harmony*

Numerology Compatibility compares the vibration of two names to reveal their natural harmony, chemistry, and spiritual alignment. It shows how two life paths weave together, highlighting shared strengths, challenges, and karmic ties. 💞

Some connections feel effortless because the numbers support growth and balance, while others bring intense lessons meant to shape your destiny. This reading uncovers the hidden energy between two souls, whether in love, friendship, or partnership.

Discover whether your bond is karmic, destined, or simply a fleeting connection—and how to deepen your understanding of each other. ✨

✍️ *Please enter both full names separated by a comma.*
Example: `Emma Grace, John Carter`
intro_love_vibes:
❤️ *Love Vibes – Today’s Romantic Energy*

Every day carries a unique numerological vibration that influences matters of the heart. The *Love Vibes Reading* reveals the emotional and romantic energy surrounding you right now. 🌸

It shows how the day’s universal energy interacts with your personal name vibration, guiding you to opportunities for connection, attraction, or self-love. You’ll understand whether today calls for intimacy, reflection, or deep emotional growth.

This insight can help you approach relationships with clarity and align with the day’s romantic flow. ✨

✍️ *Please enter your full name to receive your personalized Love Vibes reading.*
intro_personal_year:
🌌 *Personal Year Forecast – Your Yearly Vibration*

Numerology moves in 9-year cycles, and each year carries a unique vibration shaping your life themes. Your *Personal Year Number* reveals what energy you are currently living in—whether it’s a year of new beginnings, relationships, transformation, or completion. 🔄

Understanding this yearly vibration helps you align with the universe instead of resisting it, making better decisions for growth, love, and purpose.

This forecast offers a roadmap for the year ahead, showing the opportunities and challenges that await you. ✨

📅 *Please enter your birthdate in the format: `DD.MM.YYYY` to discover your Personal Year Forecast.*
intro_moon_energy:
🌕 *Moon Energy Today – Lunar Numerology Reading*

The Moon influences our emotions, intuition, and inner world. Each day, the Moon holds a different vibration that affects how we feel, act, and connect spiritually. 🌙

This reading combines lunar phases with numerology to reveal today’s emotional current—whether it’s a day for reflection, action, healing, or manifesting.

Tap into the Moon’s guidance to flow with the day’s cosmic rhythm and align your energy with the universe. ✨

_No input needed – simply tap this button anytime to receive today’s Moon Energy reading._
intro_daily_vibe:
🗓 *Daily Universal Vibe – Collective Energy of the Day*

Each calendar day carries a universal numerology number that affects everyone collectively. It’s like the ‘mood’ of the universe that shapes interactions, opportunities, and events globally. 🌍

Knowing today’s Universal Vibe helps you plan and act in harmony with the cosmic flow—whether it’s a day for productivity, self-care, communication, or letting go.

This quick reading helps you tune into the day’s collective rhythm. ✨

_No input needed – simply tap this button anytime to receive today’s Universal Vibe._
intro_angel_number:
🪬 *Angel Number Decoder – Messages from the Divine*

When you repeatedly see specific numbers like 111, 222, or 1234, it’s not coincidence—it’s guidance from the universe. These *Angel Numbers* carry messages meant to align you with your higher path. ✨

This tool reveals the spiritual meaning of the number sequences you’ve been noticing, decoding what your guides want you to know right now.

Whether it’s reassurance, a call to action, or a sign of transformation, you’ll gain clarity and comfort from the message.

✍️ *Please enter the number sequence you’ve been seeing, e.g. `111`, `4444`, or `123`.*
intro_name_vibration:
🌀 *Name Vibration Analyzer – The Energy of Names*

Every name carries a unique numerological vibration that shapes identity, personality, and destiny. Whether it’s your own name, a brand, or a business, this tool reveals the hidden energy it radiates. 🔮

Understanding a name’s vibration helps you see how it influences perception, success, relationships, and spiritual alignment.

Curious about a potential name change or the energy of your company? This reading unveils its deeper meaning.

✍️ *Please enter the name you wish to analyze.*
cta_try_more: 🔮 *Want deeper insight?* Unlock our Premium Tools — 🕳 Karmic Debt, ❤️ Love Vibes, 🌌 Personal Year Forecast, and more — for a complete picture of your numerology profile. Your numbers have more to tell you. 💫
error_invalid_date:
❗ *Invalid date format.*
Please enter like this: `04.07.1992`

result_life_path.1:
✨ *Life Path 1 — The Trailblazer*
You are here to initiate, to stand in your own sovereignty, and to create where nothing yet exists. 1 is the archetype of self-leadership, originality, and independence. You thrive when charting your own course and refusing to live in another’s shadow. The challenge is to balance confidence with humility — to lead without dominance, to inspire without imposing. When you claim your role as a conscious pioneer, you awaken courage in others and leave a legacy of innovation and integrity.
result_life_path.2:
🤝 *Life Path 2 — The Harmonizer*
Your soul’s work is to weave connection and unity. 2 carries the vibration of peace, diplomacy, and deep listening. You are most fulfilled when building bridges and guiding people toward mutual understanding. Your gift is emotional intelligence, but your challenge is not to lose yourself in service. When you protect your own boundaries, your empathy becomes a healing force. As a peacemaker, you show the world that harmony is not weakness — it is the quiet power that binds life together.
result_life_path.3:
🎨 *Life Path 3 — The Creative Messenger*
You are here to uplift, to communicate beauty, and to translate feeling into form. 3 holds the energy of joy, self-expression, and artistic brilliance. Your words, images, or performances carry medicine for the soul. Your challenge is to discipline your creativity so your ideas manifest fully. When you trust your voice, you become a beacon of inspiration — proof that laughter, color, and story can heal as deeply as logic and reason.
result_life_path.4:
🏗 *Life Path 4 — The Master Builder*
Structure is your sacred gift. 4 is the number of stability, discipline, and practical manifestation. You are here to build lasting foundations — in work, relationships, and community. Your strength is reliability; your challenge is avoiding rigidity. When you combine method with vision, you can create systems and structures that outlast you, giving others the safety to dream bigger than they ever dared.
result_life_path.5:
🌍 *Life Path 5 — The Freedom Pathfinder*
Your essence is movement, change, and expansion. 5 is the restless seeker, hungry for variety, new experiences, and personal evolution. You thrive when life is an adventure, but your challenge is to anchor that freedom in responsibility. When you learn to master change rather than be mastered by it, you become a guide for others, showing them how to embrace the unknown without fear.
result_life_path.6:
💞 *Life Path 6 — The Nurturer of Harmony*
You are here to serve, to heal, and to protect what you love. 6 carries the frequency of responsibility, beauty, and care for others. You excel in creating spaces where people feel safe and valued. Your challenge is to balance self-care with service. When you love yourself as deeply as you love others, your influence becomes both nourishing and sustainable — a true source of harmony in the world.
result_life_path.7:
🔮 *Life Path 7 — The Seeker of Wisdom*
Your path is one of inner exploration, contemplation, and spiritual mastery. 7 is the analyst and mystic, drawn to life’s deeper truths. You are at home in study, meditation, and the quiet observation of the human condition. The challenge is not to isolate yourself from the world you wish to understand. When you share your insights with compassion, you light the way for others on their own journeys of awakening.
result_life_path.8:
💼 *Life Path 8 — The Power Alchemist*
You are here to master material and spiritual success in equal measure. 8 governs authority, strategy, and the responsible use of power. You have the potential to create significant wealth or influence, but your challenge is to lead with ethics and vision. When you channel ambition into service, your achievements uplift not only you, but everyone in your sphere.
result_life_path.9:
🌈 *Life Path 9 — The Humanitarian Visionary*
Your essence is compassion, creativity, and a deep sense of purpose. 9 is the old soul, called to serve humanity and bring beauty to the collective. You are here to complete cycles, release what no longer serves, and inspire others through your example. The challenge is to avoid martyrdom — give from fullness, not depletion. When you live in alignment, your presence becomes a living work of art and love.
result_life_path.11:
⚡ *Life Path 11 — The Spiritual Illuminator*
This master number heightens intuition, vision, and the ability to inspire. You are a channel for insight and awakening, receiving messages that can shift lives. The challenge is to ground your sensitivity so it doesn’t overwhelm you. When you anchor your visions in practical action, your light becomes a steady beacon that guides others toward their highest potential.
result_life_path.22:
🏛 *Life Path 22 — The Master Architect*
22 fuses the dreamer’s vision (11) with the builder’s discipline (4). You are here to manifest grand ideas into tangible, lasting reality. You have the capacity to influence the world on a large scale, but your challenge is to avoid burnout and to pace your progress. When you align discipline with purpose, you create structures that transform lives for generations.
result_life_path.33:
🌟 *Life Path 33 — The Master Teacher*
33 is the vibration of unconditional love and service. You are here to heal, guide, and inspire through compassion and wisdom. Your path requires deep emotional maturity and the ability to care without losing yourself. When you balance self-nurture with service, your influence becomes a quiet revolution — changing the world heart by heart.

result_birthday.1:
✨ *Birthday 1 — The Pioneer’s Spark*
You arrive with a first‑mover current: initiative, courage, and a need to steer your own life. The 1 day bestows a signature of self‑reliance and inventive fire. When you choose boldly, you activate doors that weren’t visible to others. Your growth edge is learning influence without force—let clarity, not control, lead. Avoid isolation by inviting counsel, yet keep authorship of your path. When your will aligns with purpose, you become a lodestar for new beginnings—decisive, upright, and quietly unstoppable.
result_birthday.2:
🤝 *Birthday 2 — The Harmonic Bridge*
Sensitivity is your compass. Born on a 2 day, you read nuance, calm conflict, and weave trust. Your intuitive timing smooths transitions and helps people feel seen. This is a signature of partnership, diplomacy, and gentle power. Guard your boundaries so empathy doesn’t turn into over‑accommodation. Collaboration is your catalyst: when you listen without absorbing, you transform tension into accord. Your gift is the art of two—balancing yin and yang, head and heart—until resonance replaces noise.
result_birthday.3:
🎨 *Birthday 3 — The Creative Voice*
The 3 day confers sparkle: expression, humor, and a knack for turning ideas into experiences. Words, image, rhythm—your soul speaks fluently in color. Creativity isn’t a hobby for you; it’s oxygen. Share generously, but anchor your inspiration with practice and completion. Doubt dissolves when you create anyway. Your presence brightens rooms because it validates joy as sacred intelligence. When you refine your craft, your stories become medicine—lifting others while returning you to your own vibrant center.
result_birthday.4:
🏗 *Birthday 4 — The Foundation Builder*
Born on a 4 day, you carry architecture in your bones—order, method, and patient strength. You turn vision into structure, chaos into cadence. Responsibility suits you, as long as you leave space for breath and change. Rigidity is the shadow; resilience is the mastery. Trust the slow burn: daily disciplines compound into legacy. People lean on you because you make things dependable. Brick by brick, you craft frameworks where talent can flourish—and where promises actually hold.
result_birthday.5:
🌍 *Birthday 5 — The Liberator of Change*
The 5 day infuses you with movement: curiosity, adaptability, and magnetism. You’re designed to explore edges and translate variety into wisdom. Freedom is essential—but it matures into sovereignty when paired with focus. Restlessness shifts into discovery once you choose a direction. Your body is your instrument; travel, learning, and sensual experience keep you vivid. When you commit to conscious adventure, you become a herald of possibilities—showing others how to expand without losing center.
result_birthday.6:
💞 *Birthday 6 — The Heart Steward*
A 6 day births a guardian energy—care, aesthetics, and devotion to what is tender. You’re drawn to nurture people, places, and projects into harmony. Beauty is not vanity here; it’s medicine that restores coherence. The challenge is over‑responsibility—love is strongest with boundaries. Your gifts shine in home, community, mentoring, and design. Lead with kindness and clarity; create sanctuaries where trust can root. When you include yourself in your circle of care, your presence becomes healing and enduring.
result_birthday.7:
🔮 *Birthday 7 — The Inner Sage*
The 7 day confers depth, discretion, and a hunger for truth. You process life through insight, not spectacle. Solitude is not loneliness—it’s your laboratory. Study, contemplation, nature, and spiritual practice are native habitats. The work is to let others in without diluting your clarity. When you share distilled understanding, your calm becomes catalytic. You teach by precision and presence, revealing patterns beneath appearances. Mystery respects you because you approach it with humility and rigor.
result_birthday.8:
💼 *Birthday 8 — The Strategist of Result*
An 8 day arrives with voltage: leadership, enterprise, and an innate sense of scale. You think in systems and outcomes, unafraid of responsibility. Money and power respond to your integrity—when ethics lead, abundance follows. The shadow is control; the mastery is stewardship. Develop emotional intelligence alongside ambition and you’ll build empires that uplift. Your authority is earned by consistency. When you align vision, people, and timing, results become inevitable—and beneficial to more than just you.
result_birthday.9:
🌈 *Birthday 9 — The Humanitarian Flame*
The 9 day carries completion, compassion, and artistic soul. You feel the collective heartbeat and want your life to matter. Release is your alchemy; when you let endings end, grace floods in. You translate pain into beauty and experience into wisdom. Guard against savior fatigue—serve from wholeness, not depletion. Your path is generosity with discernment. As you honor your sensitivity, your presence becomes a soft revolution—elevating culture through kindness, creativity, and courageous closure.
result_birthday.11:
⚡ *Birthday 11 — The Luminous Messenger*
Master Number 11 heightens perception, intuition, and voltage of vision. You’re a conduit—receiving flashes that can awaken others. The nervous system is your instrument; ground it with breath, routine, and somatic care. Your lesson is to translate the mystical into the practical. When you commit to craft and service, inspiration stabilizes into guidance. You don’t need to be loud to be catalytic—your frequency speaks. Align message with humility and your light becomes a path, not a spotlight.
result_birthday.22:
🏛 *Birthday 22 — The Great Realizer*
Master Number 22 blends 11’s vision with 4’s engineering. You are here to articulate big patterns into usable structures—schools of thought, platforms, communities, products that endure. Discipline is sacred; team is essential. Keep ideals high and processes clean. The trap is overwhelm—prioritize and phase the dream. When you lead from service, your projects become ecosystems that outlast trends. You are a builder of bridges between inspiration and implementation—turning "someday" into a solid, shared reality.
